dimensions.label: Creativity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creative tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex problems into manageable parts and analyze data to find innovative solutions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and imagination, generating novel ideas without overthinking or analyzing.

dimensions.label: Emotional Intelligence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle emotional conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will put themselves in others' shoes, actively listening and acknowledging emotions to diffuse tension.
Your FarTwin will maintain a logical perspective, focusing on facts rather than emotions to make decisions.

dimensions.label: Risk-Taking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new opportunities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold action, seizing risks with confidence and enthusiasm to achieve success.
Your FarTwin will weigh options carefully, prioritizing stability over potential gains.

dimensions.label: Perfectionism
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for flawlessness, pouring attention to detail into every task.
Your FarTwin will prioritize efficiency and effectiveness over perfection, adapting to changing circumstances.

dimensions.label: Social Connections
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin build relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be the life of the party, effortlessly forming connections and commanding attention.
Your FarTwin will prefer smaller, more intimate settings, carefully curating meaningful relationships.

dimensions.label: Adaptability
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle change?

options.description: Your FarTwin will bounce back quickly, embracing new challenges and opportunities.
Your FarTwin will prefer stability and routine, resisting sudden changes or disruptions.

dimensions.label: Self-Awareness
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin understand their motivations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will engage in introspection, examining thoughts and emotions to gain insight.
Your FarTwin will act on instinct, trusting their gut feelings without analyzing motivations.

dimensions.label: Ambition
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin pursue goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will push themselves to achieve success, driven by a strong desire for accomplishment.
Your FarTwin will approach challenges with hope and enthusiasm, trusting that opportunities will arise.
